RELEASE NOTES

        
	Complete File Renamer 3.0 is a flexible tool that can make your
	lives more interesting thanks to its functions. It is a multiple file
	renaming tool. 

	It makes it easy to keep movie, music, image and other files names
	consistent and organized. 

	It comes with lots of renaming options, mp3 tag support, instant preview
	capabilities, a user friendly graphical interface.

	This version of Complete File Renamer comes with a command line utility
	tool cfen.exe, aka Command Line File Renamer 3.0. Using this utility you
	can write batch commands or scripts to automate your file renaming tasks.



FEATURES

	# Preview your changes instanly.
	# Color coded and verbose messages.
	# Complete Undo / Redo capabilities.
	# Recursively process subfolders.
	# Drag and Drop files from Windows.
	# Powerful sorting capabilities.
	# Case dictionary for custom spelling of words.
	# Includes cfren.exe, Command Line File Renamer.
	# Rename MP3 file with song information

    		* Supports ID3v1 1.0, 1.1
    		* Supports ID3v2 2.2, 2.3, 2.4
    		* Rename using common media file name formats.
    		* Free style renaming using mp3 tags.
    		* Show mp3 tags in preview list columns.

	# Change extension. Change extension case.
	# Insert/Delete spaces. Convert characters.
	# Change filename case.
	# Replace text.
	# Insert text.
	# Delete text.
	# Add numbers. Fix existing numbers
